title: Melvin Carvalho
content:
- ### OntologyBlock

	- #### Relationships
	  id:: melvin-carvalho-relationships

	- #### OWL Axioms
	  id:: melvin-carvalho-owl-axioms

		  Declaration(Class(mv:MelvinCarvalho))

		  # Classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:MelvinCarvalho mv:ConceptualEntity)
		  SubClassOf(mv:MelvinCarvalho mv:Concept)

		  # Domain classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:MelvinCarvalho
		    ObjectSomeValuesFrom(mv:belongsToDomain mv:MetaverseDomain)
		  )

		  # Annotations
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:label mv:MelvinCarvalho "Melvin Carvalho"@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:comment mv:MelvinCarvalho "A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on melvin carvalho."@en)

- [Split Screen Markdown Editor](https://nostr.app/doc.html?uri=https%3A%2F%2Fnosdav.net%2Fdeea5fc0740b6bf2ffcacde8bcd73f5b085057bfcea5e533a96a9700a736a382%2Fpublic%2Fmindmaps%2Fsethue.md)
-
- Vertcoins on nostr address
- ```
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:36]
    want to try something?  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:36]
    that's what I was planning  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:36]
    sure  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:36]
    whats your nostr pubkey?  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:37]
    npub1hl8jp4rj7ra3gweredd787s2qsx5y9mtw8mnegnj76gjk8tz53fqdcraa9  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:37]
    do you have the hex pubkey?  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:37]
    yeah somewhere one sec  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:38]
    $ nak decode npub1hl8jp4rj7ra3gweredd787s2qsx5y9mtw8mnegnj76gjk8tz53fqdcraa9  
    {  
    "pubkey": "bfcf20d472f0fb143b23cb5be3fa0a040d42176b71f73ca272f6912b1d62a452"  
    }  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:38]
    ill show you 2 things that no one knows about  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:38]
    oops  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:39]
    lol  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:39]
    bfcf20d472f0fb143b23cb5be3fa0a040d42176b71f73ca272f6912b1d62a452  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:39]
    so many people must do that  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:39]
    as above  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:39]
    first thing no one knows about  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:40]
    https://brain-wallet.github.io/bech32m/  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:40]
    if you go to encode bech32m  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:41]
    put in bfcf20d472f0fb143b23cb5be3fa0a040d42176b71f73ca272f6912b1d62a452  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:41]
    and check hexedecimal  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:41]
    you can now change the prefix to do magical things  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:42]
    bc = bitcoin taproot  
    tb = taproot testnet  
    ex = liquid  
    vtc = vetcoin live  
    ltc = litcoin live  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:42]
    OH! I never thought of prefixing  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    fuckme.. I have written some very over complex code like an idiot  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    vtc1phl8jp4rj7ra3gweredd787s2qsx5y9mtw8mnegnj76gjk8tz53fq62xp5p  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    look your vtc key is very close to your npub  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    using derivation paths  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    now the 2nd magical thing  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    https://flyp.me/en/#/  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:43]
    try this on the left hand side put in lightning (lnx)  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:44]
    on the right hand side put in vtc  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:44]
    then put in 291 sats  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:44]
    0.00000291  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:45]
    and put this in the VTC wallet address: vtc1phl8jp4rj7ra3gweredd787s2qsx5y9mtw8mnegnj76gjk8tz53fq62xp5p  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:46]
    WTAF  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:46]
    if you're still following, click in generate invoice  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:47]
    "Flyp Now"  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:47]
    it's sending to VTC  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:47]
    order complete  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:47]
    that was fast!  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:47]
    what has just happened??!??!!!?!?  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:48]
    https://vtc5.trezor.io/address/vtc1phl8jp4rj7ra3gweredd787s2qsx5y9mtw8mnegnj76gjk8tz53fq62xp5p  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:48]
    you are now class of 2023  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:48]
    this is very wild  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:48]
    give it 150s and and you'll get a confirm  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:49]
    magic, eh?  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:49]
    yeah, legit magic. Like, all the promises at once  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:50]
    took me months to figure this out, its barely documented  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:50]
    confirmed!  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:50]
    you now have 300 million vert satoshis  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:50]
    and your address is provable to exist before today  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:51]
    that's pretty nuts man  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:52]
    vert is just like [[Bitcoin]], so it can have [[RGB and Client Side Validation]] and everything on top of it  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:52]
    except now you have enough for 10,000 tx  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:53]
    also vert is not a shit coin, there's 9996 / 10000 shit coins, but vert was fair, no premine, no ico, no air drop  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:54]
    well. I am going to get some lunch, this is wild. I have some code planning to do  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:54]
    also nice that lightning is actually useful at those amounts  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:54]
    that kinda changes everything, I was leaning on taproot asset tokens but they are spammy as fuck  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:54]
    all those weeks we were trying to get testnet coins, now we have something better  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:55]
    nostr hex is the base ID for our users  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:55]
    basically wow  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:55]
    yes and it costs 10 MSATs for a transfer  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:56]
    on-chain, so you can just go on chain, no need for lightning  
  - Melvin Carvalho, [28/11/2023 11:56]
    its actually cheaper than lightning  
  - biscuits, [28/11/2023 11:56]
    how the... I need to take a look through all this madness
  ```

## Current Landscape (2025)

- Industry adoption and implementations
  - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards
  - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership
  - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins
  - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies

- Technical capabilities
  - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels
  - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences
  - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building
  - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion

- UK and North England context
  - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research
  - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training
  - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems
  - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology

- Standards and frameworks
  - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols
  - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences
  - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange
  - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
